column4: i want to install gtk and all needed packages for gui programming with C and GTK+. what command should i use ? can i use apt-get?
of course you can use apt-get
what command should i use to install it from command line ?
Michalxo: guntbert: bucky: thanks for your help. i got it working with 2 commands: sudo apt-get install build-essential and sudo apt-get install libgtk2.0-dev
